Name: wind turbine network connection construction, 2MW, onshore | wind turbine network connection, 2MW, onshore | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/28:Manufacture of machinery and equipment n.e.c./281:Manufacture of general-purpose machinery/2811:Manufacture of engines and turbines, except aircraft, vehicle and cycle eng
Description: 10 kV-cables with a total length of 1000 m per turbine are assumed to be used for the connection to the electricity network. Image: Cable trench and characteristics of the onshore cable used for the connection of the offshore wind park [Ilskov H. (2003) Offshore work on the 150 kV substation and the submarine cable.
